description: A tough, durable alpine climbing pant for guides and those who follow them. The Chockstone Alpine is a heavyweight softshell pant that can take the kind of abuse that comes from daily use in extreme conditions. It’s a workhorse. Created specifically for alpine guides, it has tons of useful features--even a thigh pocket that’s designed to hold a logbook and a map.
name: Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Alpine Pants, Reg - Mens
